summary: A DLC sized mod under construction.
descriptionHtml:
[center](VOICE ACTORS AND HELP ON MOD NEEDED)[/center]

[center]Explore Skyrim in a way you never have before! In the 1st Era!

Get sucked back in time by a Dwemer portal which throws you into the middle of the war between the Dwemer and the Snow Elves! Which side will you choose? Or will you join the Resistance Force to stop the fighting and get home, where the two races will hopefully live in peace and harmony with the rest of the Fourth Era? It's up to you to decide who you join![/center]
[center]Voice Actors needed for Main and Sub characters. Comment below or send me a message if you would like to voice a character; Dwemer, Snow Elf or both.

Help to make this mod is needed. Anyone who wants to help please also send me a message.[/center]

[center](Unable to explore 1st Era Skyrim yet, only Dwemer Ruins are available.)[/center]
author: serenityswillow
